Object.Comment:
Second dungeon. Introduces gummies, apricorns an orbs to the item pool.
5th floor spawns a special secret stair unlocked by hidden switch.

Segments.Comment:
Windswept Ridge - 3 extra floors of another tileset, with more water and occasional rain. 
This path not only leads to the surprise dungeon Frigid Lake, but also contains a rescuable Minior.
